text: qal nwh: ya qawmi 'ara'aytum 'iin knt ealaa hujat zahirat min rabiy fima jitukum bih tbyin lakum 'anani ealaa alhaqu min endh, watani rahmatan min endh, wahi alnubuat walrsalt fakhfaha ealaykum bsbb jhlkm wghrwrkm, fahal yasihu 'ana nulzmkm 'iyaha bal'ikrah wa'antum jahdwn bha? la nafeal dhlk, wlkn nakil 'amrakum 'iilaa allah hataa yaqdi fi 'amrakum ma ysha'
